knimeNode.name: Fingerprints Expander
knimeNode.shortDescription: Splits BitVector values to individual bits.

fullDescription.intro: Splits column with BitVector values to a number of individual columns with one bit in each of them. That is, 256 new columns will be created for a BitVector with 256 bits.
fullDescription.option: The name of the column of BitVectors which will be split.

ports.inPort: A table with at least one BitVector compatible column
ports.outPort: The input table with additional columns for each bit in the BitVectors. Note that the number of these columns can be large if the underlying BitVectors are large.
